website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy power bank will be at the ready in your pocket, purse, or backpack but expect it to be a little heavy.
pros: Able to charge several devices before needing to be charged itself, and has two output ports – 2.4 and 2.1 – that both have smart charging
cons: It can take a while to charge itself

customer_reviews.title: A premium beast
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this portable battery it's built like a tank well a midsize tank but a tank none the less it's ismart features and it's battery it's kind of like a tanks battery last forever. It has two ports 12.4 a and another one 2.1 a and I usb in sorry guys no USB C you'll have to get an adapter for that it comes with a premium pouch that you can store it in and also comes with two USB cables. I've done some battery reviews in the past but this is a really premium Budget Battery.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kight

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a trip in May 2018. It worked well during my time there - I would get around 3 full charges for my iPhone X before the pack would need to be plugged back in to recharge. However, by November 2018, it is no longer holding a charge as it initially did. After being fully charged and unused (with absolutely nothing plugged in - not even a charging cable), I was disappointed when it showed zero charge whatsoever when plugging my phone in a month later during a power outage. While I was initially very pleased with this product, I found the declining quality to be disappointing for the price after only six months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: My phone's battery never dies!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I went without this for so long. I charge this and my phone every night and carry this with me throughout the day. The Two USB ports are great, whether I'm charging my phone and my IPad or my phone and the cute girl's phone who is seated next to me on the bus or subway. This charges my phone fast, about 1.5 hours, and does it how ever many times I've needed so far or I'll just leave my phone plugged up to it all day and not even think about my battery dying or how much I'm using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete wilson

customer_reviews.title: The best travel companion for your phone
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack has lasted me almost 3 years now. It’s gone on a ton of trips with me & sometimes I just use it when I’m in bed. I accidentally dropped it on my last trip in Colombia & now my ports won’t work. But the battery still charges. The battery pack is slightly heavy but I think this battery pack was tough, held up & I definitely got GOOD use out of it. I also thought it held a long charge & I could use it for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Not too big or small
customer_reviews.text: Great fit to carry for long trips and has a great sturdy look
customer_reviews.author: NDO

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this charger as an upgrade to a small pocket charger I've had for years. I've used this small charger as a backup when I'm recording a concert and don't want to run out of power. This was suppose to be an upgrade BUT it's not. Any time I've connected it on either the 2.4A or 2.1A it never charges my phone all the way. Sometimes it stops at 26% or like this am it stopped at 40%. I always check and the charger lights show that it's full but it's not transferring the power to the phone. If you are looking for a reliable charger don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: medolark

customer_reviews.title: Defective, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this item. I purchased it last year to use for a trip that was cancelled. It has sat in a drawer until 1 week ago. I started using this last week to charge my phone at work. I've used this a total of 5x and now it wont hold a charge. I would not recommend this product to anyone! This should be rated as a disposable device. Look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: We will not take charge past 75%
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived fully charged and worked fine until it was discharged. Unit will not charge past 75%. I have tried three different 2.4amp chargers and several cables yet the unit will only get to about 75% charge. Unit has been charging for more than 24 hours on these chargers. Defective? I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: krümel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My phone dies fairly quick, so finding a power bank that would hold enough charges to charge my phone multiple times in a day was important. This charges my phone around 5 to 6 times per fully charged bank. It's heavy but for the amount of power it's an easily liveable trade off. It has dual ports which my wife and I have also been able to utilize simultaneously which is great. It comes with 2 charge cords as well. Led lights on the side give a very accurate way of tracking how much is left to use or how much till the bank is fully charged. Great product, well built, most of all inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: Overheated to the point of creating am internal short-circuit.  Not good!!!
customer_reviews.text: This battery ran hot during charging and discharging. But that was as advertised. What was NOT as advertised, was that the battery overheated to the point of warping the case, and creating an apparent internal short circuit that caused the battery to completely discharge from the flashlight staying on. And it produced copius amounts of heat in the process. The battery now will not accept a charge at all. Im lucky the thing didn't set my home on fire! And Amazon says they're return policy precludes them making things right. Missed the 30 day cutoff by 6 days. Im VERY disappointed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for IPHONES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an external back up battery pack for my phone. I opened it up as soon as it came because my phone was almost dead anyways. This package came with two charging ports, both for what looks like android phones. I will be returning. Another con : It is heavier than other charging packs I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Better if charger came with it, but otherwise great to have around.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be better IF it supplied the charging wall wort as well. It requests a 2A supply, which is beefy for the usual cell phone/tablet chargers. I found out it will charge more slowly with a lower amp charger (not mentioned, just took a chance I would not blow the charger out). Best feature is peace of mind with all the power outages in CA at the moment. Oh, runs my Huion light table fine too, making it portable instead of attached to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Patton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging
customer_reviews.text: I used it for vacation a year ago for one week. After that week I stored it away and forgot about it. I pulled it out recently, planning to use it for this year's vacation, and it won't hold a charge. What a waste. **Update** After reaching out to customer service, I was quickly supplied a replacement charger due to the warranty. The customer service was quick to respond, very friendly, and solved my issue with little strain. While it'd be nice if it didn't stop working in the first place, I still give it 4 stars as I was able to get my issue resolved and it is a good portable charger otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has two usb ports and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Love that it has two usb ports and comes with two cables. It also came fully charged which was a pleasant surprise. It holds 3.5 charges for my galaxy S7 and can be fully recharged when I plug it in overnight. It's sleek and compact. I took it with me on my trip out of the country and used it to charge my phone in my backpack. Worked like a charm and didn't have to recharge it until after a few days of use. I think it's definitely worth it as I will be getting a lot of use out of it. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TuCool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for power outages due to Hurricanes. I highly recommend this for anyone who lives in hurricane ally! This took no time at all to fully charge and barely used any power to charge my phone,watch and blue tooth speaker. My tablet drained it but it charged it to 100% over night,but I was able to charge the battery pack which did'nt take that long at all maybe 4hours. This would work for travel or whatever it might be needed for but for power outages(Hurricanes etc) I can not say enough about it and to keep in anyone's Hurricane box. I ordered one for my mom as well for this very reason.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Less than 6 months it is now defective
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this RAVPower charger from Amazon on May 13, 2019. It was working fine and charging fine. Now the unit is no longer working. When it's charged, it would start with the 1 light, then all lights blinking non stop, then it never completed the charge, even though it's been charged for 24 hours or more. The blue battery light only shows 1 bar no matter how many times and how many hours it's charged. This unit is now defective in less than 6 months. Please advise if you can send a replacement unit or refund our money back.
customer_reviews.author: johnny_utah

customer_reviews.title: Updated to 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay charged for iPhone 11. It charges as soon as you plug it to the phone but as soon as the phone screen shut off, it stopped charging. I thought the charger was defected so I order another one and I still had the same issue. Updated - 03/18/2020 My original review of the product was 1 star because it didn't work for me. I changed the review to 5 stars because of the great customer service seller provided and backed up their product 100%. They contacted me and offered free replacements without questions asked which I didn't expect. The replacement devices worked!!! This seller is recommended! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: MTL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Ravpower power bank. The first one I dropped from a very high level and it cracked and would never charge. (My fault) The second one, I thought I lost, then I found it, after I bought this third one. I gave the "lost" one to my husband. I bought one more to send with my daughter to college. It lasts a long time and can charge my tablet to full capacity and still have battery power to charge my phone. It does take a while to fully charge (overight), but as long as you plan well, you will have an excellent portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: Totally would recommend this to anyone. It has a large capacity to charge a phone multiple time over that will never leave you in the dust. I have had this about 1.5 years and no signs of it failing or preforming any worse than the day I got it. I originally got this to power a Raspberry PI and to my surprise, it was able to run the Pi for 6+ hours (made a portable photo booth). I don't use the flashlight mode much. 16750mAh capacity with dual ports outputting 2.1A and 2.4A. It is a bit bulky and has some weight to it compared to other power banks, but really this is a hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Connie McCreight

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom outlets are in awkward places, so I''ve used this power bank for the last 2 years on almost a daily basis to charge my phone while I'm sleeping. I'm able to get 4+ charges for my iphone and bluetooth headphones before it's drained down to 25% (1 dot). It's a great value, especially in 2020 which half the price I paid for it in 2018. The only issue I've observed is that the flashlight on it stopped working about a year ago. I don't use this feature, so it was an non-issue for me. I highly recommend this power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chicklet

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a powerhouse; charges 2 devices at once!  Wish I got this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Galaxy for personal use and an iPhone issued to me by work and this portable charger will charge both devices, twice! Or... it'll charge one of my phones three times and then some! I take this charger with me on the go and even use it at home when I don't feel like having my phone(s) plugged into a wall socket - my bed and sofa are both not near outlets anyway. The price was right and I definitely wish I invested in this charger sooner. A++
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great at first!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast charger that held a lot of charge! Having two USB ports and the light was just perfect, at first... I bought it in September, and now in January, it won’t hold charge anymore. I travel a lot, so it sees a lot of use, but I was hoping to get at least a year of use from it. I’m hoping to hear from the company soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with tons of charging power plus CYBERSECURITY
customer_reviews.text: I love the size because its excellent on the go, even in a breast pocket. It's good for like 5-6 full iPhone recharges so I highly recommended for travelling, concerts, or anywhere you will need juice. The brand name speaks for itself. I have another version that is white and they both are the same. PRO: Cybersecurity. Never use charging ports at airports. Always use your own cords and power source. There's been numerous hacking attacks from people plugging their phones into random cords at airports or train stations. This is how you evade you that hack.
customer_reviews.author: Yankees98

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They say it’s sipposed to be able to hold battery for a while and it is dry durable and lasts long. WELL I GOT NEWS, THATS A LIE!! I had this product for not even a full month when it decide to stop holding charge. What a huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge or hold charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to travel with, However I have hardly used it. I used it 3 times to charge my iPhone for 15 mins each use. After that I noticed that it was not charging my phone so I thought maybe I need to charge it. I have had it on charge for 48 hours now and it still hasn’t charged up. The blue light is blinking to show it’s still charging but it’s been 2 days and still not full.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: What a great battery.
customer_reviews.text: I like this battery a lot it holds a lot of charge I have about 6 or 7 of these batteries by Ravpower I also had a few by the Anker brand. the reason these are my go to batteries is because they have pass through charging which means you could charge them while they are being used. I use two of these 16750's for my Wyse cameras just in case of a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Spanky

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has two of these charges. They are so quick and lightening fast. I love them!!!!!!!!! I got one for my mom for Christmas and she uses it 24/7 now. One of my boyfriends chargers went missing for months and he blamed me for losing it...It turns out my friend jacked it from us (on accident) and was using it the whole time! I spotted it in the background of a picture she posted on Instagram lol but it’s THAT good. I wouldn’t have given it back either but definitely buy these little babies. We take two with us on trips and I use it when I need a quick charge. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Takes days to recharge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Ravpower 16750 about 10 months ago. I let my grand daughter use it to power a small USB fan for a few nights. The 'power' light bar was on the last light so I decided to plug this into a 3A USB charger, that was about 48 hours ago. The 'Ravpower' unit is now showing 3 of 4 bars as the charge level. My INIU 20000 will fully charge via USB-C on the same charger in about 12 hours. This thing is a fail for daily use. It may be good for limited emergency use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year and it’s still going strong. I love it. It holds power and charged our phone 5 times in four days while at camp. It wasn’t until the last day that we needed to charge the battery again. The battery does not take long to charge like others that we have used. It is great to have when you are out and can’t charge your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Farinas

customer_reviews.title: Bells and Whistles Plus Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second RAVPower. I love the product that much! It really comes in handy. If you do decide to purchase this unit, and you should, you will love it. I still use the first one I bought, just wanted a second so I would always be able to charge my cell phone. It comes with loads of options built in. Read the listing for details. When I had an issue and needed an answer they got back to me the same day! They reminded me that I had registered the unit and extended the warranty! Wow. Great Service and knowledgeable people. Can't beat the price. From here on I will always buy chargers from RAVPower.
customer_reviews.author: ToadToedPrincess

customer_reviews.title: This 16750mah battery does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Has 2 USB ports, one rated at 2.1A and the other at 2.4A. I usually plug into the 2.1A port to hopefully extend the life of my iPhone, unless I truly need a faster charge with the 2.4A port. (Slower charging is better for the life of your phone/tablet’s battery) I haven’t counted, but I get several charges out of it for my iPhone 6S Plus. This RAVPower 16750mah battery recharges using a normal micro-USB port. Came with a lightly padded pouch that I don’t use. I just toss the brick into my backpack. I’ve been using it for a month now with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until this month very light use wasn't charged more than six times in one year. Yesterday tried to charged my S7 and it charged it to 87% which I though was odd. clicked the button to see the level and nothing but the unit was warm. I plugged it in to charged (with a AUKEY Quick Charge 3.0 5-Port USB Charger with 55.5W USB Charging Station) and nothing except a very warm unit. Have contacted RAVpower for an RMA. It's a little scary that it got very warm to hot. I believe it's still under warranty so they will most likely exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Good for whole family!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this just to use every now and then when stuck out at the softball field on long days but OMG we have been packing this little thing around everywhere we go! It takes a little while (overnight) to charge but totally worth it. It charges our phones within 30mins and we use it on multiple phones each day when we are outside about or in restaurants!! It’s the best $20 I’ve spent and I would definitely buy it again!! You need this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ising

customer_reviews.title: These will charge my iPhone, Watch and the Bose QC20i noise cancelling battery all day+
customer_reviews.text: I listen to Apple music when hiking, away from any cellular or wifi service, for 12-16 hours of downloaded music. Actually, these batteries (I have 4 of them) will even do the same thing at my home where we have only wifi service, all day and night and I never hear the Bose announcement, "Only 5% battery remaining, please charge now," that used to wake me when I wore the wireless QC30's. You can listen to whatever, charge a Watch and the noise cancelling feature on the corded headset at staggered intervals. I can't imagine life without these long-lasting, sturdy devices. I've dropped one while hiking and it had no ill effects even months later. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The BEST, Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: I've had this portable charger for maybe over two years now and it still works like a charm. The time to charge it is definitely something you'd need to do overnight, but it is worth it! The charge that it gives back is tremendous, in my own experience it can charge a phone from almost nothing back to 100 around 4.5 times before being on the last bit of charge. I love this charger, I take everywhere with me!
customer_reviews.author: Beanie_Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Charging the charger back up is slow. It’s slow and low quality connectors that are flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It advertised faster charging the battery pack back than other battery packs but it’s not true. It takes a longer time than you guys are advertising. This thing is bulky, the connectors to plugin are flimsy made with low quality material. I was sold on that competitive advertising point. Please be more clear what product you were comparing it to. It’s clear to me you didn’t because you’d get a lawsuit making a false claim. 2 stars because it’s good for travel once you spend forever charging it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great product! A must for blackouts!
customer_reviews.text: So, we live in California and are subject to blackouts at random. We bought this after the first round, after using a friends battery pack when our phones died. This charger is awesome! It holds a charge for days, we’ve charged both our phones multiple times. Our longest blackout was 4.5 days, it lasted through that and beyond. We keep it charged and use it from time to time to make sure it’s still holding up. Seems to be holding strong! Great product, we’ve recommended it to all our friends!
customer_reviews.author: LGodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Durable, Well-Designed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this battery pack almost daily for a few months, now. It has proven to be a great backup for several uses and, in spite of having been subjected to occasional physical abuse, it has remained reliable and virtually unscathed. I am impressed with the high capacity and overall, rugged design, with thoughtful functionality, including multiple ports, charge level indicators and an LED flashlight that I use far more often than I expected. Highly recommended for travel, camping and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Max Samfield

customer_reviews.title: Use for a week, 12+ hours to recharge device
customer_reviews.text: This initially worked excellent. Charged my phone quicker than an outlet. It doesn’t seem to hold a charge or charge my phone anymore. The light still works. Not sure what the issue is but I have only had it for a few months and use maybe once a month. Update: nothing wrong with the device. The user was the issue. This device has to recharge for over 12 hours (which I didn’t realize it took so long). Works great after a full charge. I can use it for a week before I have to recharge the device. Awesome product as long as you can wait 12+ hours for it to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Canares

customer_reviews.title: In Charge of My Phone Life
customer_reviews.text: I've had the RAVPower Power Bank on-site with me at a golf event all week long. It is a battery life game changer for my phone! Although the Power Source itself is a bit on the heavy side, I am happy to have it as part of my "essentials". The Power Bank not only kept my phone charged throughout the afternoon, I was also able to lend some power to my colleague. At night, it has charged itself very quickly. The Power Bank comes with a nifty carrying bag that keeps everything organized. I'm so glad I made this purchase and fully recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gannon, Work Play & Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait and write a review after its use and in short, its been a great product. I have already put the word out in my professional street on my fondness for it. It does take a few hours to charge (I just do it overnight at the hotel, etc), but after its full, I can recharge my phone about 5 times (LGG7). I have also found the 2.4A charges my particular phone at a rate of 1Battery point in 50seconds. So in short - takes about 45 minutes to charge my battery up 60 levels. It has some weight to it (nothing to bad), but in my backpack that points irrelevant. Recommend you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing, if I charge it overnight it’ll last for two maybe three days and that’s with a full charge. I took this to Columbia with me and you won’t believe how many times I pull this out not just be myself but for the people I was traveling with. I love the flashlight feature that’s new and different and I always recommend this power bank to others. In my opinion this is definitely worth your money. BTW I’ve had this for about a year
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good charger, works great as paperweight though.
customer_reviews.text: I rated this high to begin with but after having it for a short time the brick doesn't charge anymore. The light indicator never goes above one light anymore and I have only charged it 3 times. It was on the charger for 4 hours, I am pretty sure it shouldn't take more than that to charge full. Now it's less than 24 hours before a long flight and I am SOL.
customer_reviews.author: rylawesome

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well for About a Year
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Company sending a replacement! Changed from 2 to 4 stars for great customer service. Original: Bought Feb 2018. Almost a year later it won’t charge 100% anymore. It gets to about 75% power and won’t charge anymore. I can still use it, but it dies fast. Actually came across this page again bc I’m looking to buy another (different) one since this one is dying. Decided to leave a review. It worked well for almost a year, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went up from the 10,000mAh portable chargers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to charge a cell phone and a small Asus tablet while hunting. Had plenty of juice to charge tablet once and phone 2x. It arrived fully charged, so after I ran it down charging the aforementioned items, I let the portable charger re-charge overnight. Seems durable - flashlight not very bright, but appreciate that it's there. I bought this wall wart to provide recharging power to the 16750 RAVPower: RAVPower Wall Charger 24W 4.8A (2.4A x 2) Dual USB iSmart Technology for iPhone X / 8/ 7 / 6s / Plus, Galaxy S7 / S6 / Edge / Plus, Note 5 / 4, Foldable Plug and LED Indicator – Black
customer_reviews.author: MrFixIt

customer_reviews.title: This External Battery Pack Does NOT work on Galaxy Note 10 Phones(wrong connections)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Power Bank RAVPower 16750mAh Portable Charger Ultra-Compact External Battery Pack since the product title says it will work with the Samsung Galaxy Note 10, but it does not. The connection cords and place to plug them in on the battery pack don't match the Galaxy Note10. It looks like a very good battery pack, but I wish it had the correct cords and connection on the battery pack. I think the title for this product is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power pack for daily use!  1-year of use review.
customer_reviews.text: Love this power bank! I’ve had it a little Over a year now and it is definitely now not charging as well as it used to. It drains faster. So much so that I need a replacement. I’m a flight attendant and want assurance that I never have to worry about power. I’d say even if o have to buy one every year, it’ll still be worth it. It’s gets daily use and is plugged in every night. I love the two ports too. I’ve charged my Apple Watch on-the-go with is as well. Very well made and durable for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Perez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My phone battery sucks so I'm constantly charging it. This has been a life saver. I can charge my phone to almost 90% from the teens in less than an hour or 2... Honestly I haven't timed it because I'm out shopping but it's not more than 2 hours & I can use my phone without fear of it dying. Downside: it's heavy Upside: a charged phone Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mai Music

customer_reviews.title: Works well until it stops working...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was the perfect battery. Just the right size, charges quickly, and holds 3 charges. One day I noticed after charging it all night that for some reason it can not charge more than 1 bar. This was a huge disappointment, I took such great care of this product and it gave out on me. Not sure why this happened...but I am very saddened because this was one of my go-to things to pack for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: i love this portable charger . i’ve has this for almost 2 years and it still works as if it was brand new . when it’s fully charged it can charge my phone fully TWICE. it’s convenient when i’m traveling and it also has a flashlight that comes in handy . i use to to charge my phone , my apple watch , anything i use with a usb. it works just fine . if something ever happens to this i will buy a new one because this portable charger is perfect . the only problem is that it’s too big for my purse and a bit heavy but it still is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Sebreena

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of years it's still charges great!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is excellent. It charges my phone as fast, if not faster, than when I plug the phone into a wall outlet. It's good for about 4 phone charges. I've owned it now for a couple of years and it has really come in handy. It's a little heavy to carry in your pocket or purse, so if you don't need that many charges, you may want something smaller. But it never seems to quit. I usually use it 3 or 4 times before I recharge the charger itself. It has a light that let's you know how low the charge has gone.
customer_reviews.author: JBonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Works great after 4+ years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this power bank years ago after a friend suggested it to me and I haven’t found a better one since. It still works good as new to this day. It holds about two days worth of charge if it’s fully charged and maybe even more if your phone doesn’t need to be charged to often. I use this mostly when I’m at Disneyland or on a weekend trip away from home where I know I’ll be out a lot. I get a lot of complements from friends on this powerbank compaired to the ones they own. It’s a bit bulky and kinda heavy but it’s worth it and easily fits into your backpack or purse just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite portable charger
customer_reviews.text: It’s been two years since we had it and it’s still my favorite one of the 6 or so portable chargers we have. It’s my go to and I love that it has a shock proof sleeve for the portable charger. My family and I have used this portable charger back to back for a few mths when we first got it so I was worried it’ll drain this thing out fast, but nope! This thing charges fast and the battery life is still hanging in there.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great or 3 Months - Now it Won’t Charge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this power bank in late February for a 4 week vacation to SE Asia to keep all of my devices charged while traveling. The RavPower power bank was absolutely incredible during my vacation and served its purpose. I realized it makes my life easier while home, too. A few weeks ago it stopped fully charging when I’d plug it in to recharge. Now it won’t charge at all and the blue charging lights blink quickly when I attempt to charge it. It’s disappointing that it quit working 3.5 months after purchasing because I was in love with my RavPower power bank. Now it’s just a useless hunk of junk :(
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Mostly really good
customer_reviews.text: In general, I think this was a great buy but I have to knock it for two things: (1) the charge doesn’t seem to pay as long as I would think it should — I use it to power my oculus quest and people with 10k supplies say they get 8-10 hours of use with their. This doesn’t last that long. And (2) while I think the overall build quality in mostly awesome, the mini-usb port seems to have dislodged a bit and I sometimes have to tweak it to plug it in. That said, for ~$30 US it does the job wel.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 cycles now won't charge my Pixel 3 XL
customer_reviews.text: I love the product when it was working. It worked for two cycles while traveling and I love the carry case and the cables that it comes with. Now a couple of months later it won't charge my pixel three XL. It's connected at full charge to my pixel three XL and after eight hours I get about 40% of charge. I wonder if I got a defective item considering all the positive reviews on Amazon. Sadly it is just outside the return window to Amazon :(
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what it is and the price point. Sure there are bigger chargers. But I was looking for inexpensive, small but also with several charges in it. This was perfect. I charged my galaxy note 8 with it 5 times and still didn't drain it. It's a nice looking build and doesn't "feel" cheap. I was traveling with it and it got dropped a couple times and seems just fine. I wasn't expecting such good quality at that price. I was just looking for something to take on a trip with me. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie B

customer_reviews.title: Battery packs so handy to have
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller version of this and found that it really comes in handy. I decided to buy this bigger one because I use it quite often to charge my phone and tablet. It work great. I can charge both and still have some battery left. I can't imagine being without an external battery pack now. I also bought two other Rav battery packs for gifts and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging item is exactly as discrived. Immediately after opening I use it to charge my phone and it worked. I use my phone a lot constantly for work and usually my battery always draine fast even after changing phone and this thing will help me tremendously. Not sure why I haven't taught about buying this until now.
customer_reviews.author: Sebrin.A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Critical for Long Motorcycle Trips
customer_reviews.text: I've used this during two motorcycle trips - one a two-week venture throughout the northeast and mid-Atlantic states and again when I took a trip to Rolling Thunder 2019. This was absolutely essential in keeping my smart phone's battery almost fully charged and keeping it available throughout the trip. I also used it to keep my Sena Bluetooth device's battery charged when normal AC or DC power sources were unavailable. This is a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: CorkyMuldoon

customer_reviews.title: Great little bugger!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October of 2015. It's been great. I can change most cellphones 5 times from dead to fully charged on it before it needs a recharge. I even charged my Microsoft pro tabled on it a couple times. The only true I have is that after about 8 months the 2.4 charging side stopped working. But I've been using it still for 4yrs.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: 14 hours flying, 100% battery.
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review, while my Plane taxis to the terminals. It’s been a rough day with 14 hours of travel time behind me. Delays everywhere ! All I can say is while other passengers are scouring for a way to charge their phone, I’m landing with 100% battery in my iPhone, and this thing could probably do it all again tomorrow without needing a recharge. If you travel, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Easley

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip out of the country and it worked like a charm. Had about 4-5 charges on it per full battery. You need to let it charge for about half a day before it's at its full ability. You can check the progress of the charge by pressing the button on the front. Definitely worth it, especially when traveling or if you work outside of offices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months....DEAD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in October and one charging port stop working about 3 months ago. Now the last charging port is dead. I never brought this unit out the house not even once. Website says contact retailer for warranty and Amazon says contact them. Looks like Rav PowerPoint may make you go through some hoops for warranty exchange as they are not accessible by phone....after 6 months you will pay for shipping....I'll update if necessary Edit: RAV Power contacted me and will sent out new unit since it is still under warranty. Having a company communicate and give support for it's products is great. I will buy with confidence from Rav Power in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Great experience

Thanks...you got 5 stars!!

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work long term
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip. It worked great... at first!! Needed it about 6 months later and it wont charge anymore. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JRMom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing charger
customer_reviews.text: I have used this RavPower charger while going on hikes and trips. The ability of this charger connected to my IPhone will not lose power and it surpasses my expectation. Also, the charger is light weight, so when I go on hikes or trips I hardly notice it in my backpack, included is a fantastic flashlight too. In addition, I have used this charger while playing Pokeman Go for over 3 or 4 hours long, the battery life is outstanding. The quality and durability of RavPower charger is well constructed. I recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service! They stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: I love this battery. It charges my S8 3 or 4 times while it's running. It ended up having a problem about 10 months after I bought it, but a few quick emails with their customer service got me a warranty replacement quickly and easily. They offer a free extended warranty on their website and their customer service is very friendly. You will be happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: My RavPower.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first portable charger that I've ever owned. Having said that, I can't compare this with anything else that's on the market. What I can say, it has charged up my iPhone several times. Can't say that I'd ever use the flashlight on this unit, but it may come in hand for someone else. I found with this very high mAh, that it takes more than 12-hours to fully recharge. Something like this is nice to have in case of emergency, when the power in your home goes out, and your phone battery is dead. I would definitely recommend this product to family and friends. Money very well spent indeed. Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: MegaDave

customer_reviews.title: Fastest charger I have found with great capacity.
customer_reviews.text: This is a review and comparison of two external chargers I purchased at the same time. The Haidue , and the RavPower  We took both on vacation used them several times, charged them and put them on the shelf until our next trip, about six weeks. At that point, the Haidue was dead, would not take a charge and is still non- functional. The RavPower is much the opposite. It is very powerful and have great capacity. It is very fast, charging a dead battery on a Samsung S5 in under two hours, much faster than the A/C powered Samsung smart charger. I have fully charged my phone 3 times and still had reserve in the RavPower charger.
customer_reviews.author: NotBob

customer_reviews.title: Don't ignore it!
customer_reviews.text: Lesson learned - After not using it for several months it will no longer take a charge. They recommend you keep it charged at a minimum of 25% to maintain it. Apparently this is true of all lithium batteries. If they sit too long without a charge they are just gone. I liked it, but mostly used it for travel although it was a bit bulky and heavy. I bought it 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best battery pack I've owned yet.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for some time now and still charges everything I need with no issues. Internal batteries have lasted well and no signs of slowing down. Well made and you can recharge the battery pack while it's charging your phone or tablet. Make sure you charge the pack until the 4th led stops flashing. Then the charge is complete. Make sure you drain the pack as much as possible before recharging to keep the batteries working at their best. Great product and a best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Misnblu

customer_reviews.title: I like it allot
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well-built battery pack. Not sure what 18650 battery brand is inside but it charged fine and charges my Samsung S8+’s quickly. I tested the rate of charge at 80% battery (in the S8+) and it charges at 1.3 amps on the 2.4 port and 1.22 amps on the 2.1 port. I am happy so far with the quality and functionality of this unit and would at this point recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: wildtrky

customer_reviews.title: Very straightforward and capable
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised, but most importantly I can leave it plugged in while charging other devices too. Effectively this can act as a tiny UPS and charge my phone and other USB stuff while the car's off. (not that I leave the phone in the car, but I could) This was the one feature I wasn't sure about, and the one thing they should've advertised better, but it does have a dedicated input port specifically for charging. There's also a flashlight too, but I use this to charge a USB-powered flashlight. I guess it couldn't hurt to have another one, right? Well, it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Jixijenga

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: My RavPower 24 w arrived as expected. I am always pleased with the performance of this merchandise. This is actually my 3rd charger, as every time one of my family members see how this charger performs they'd take it from me. I am also impressed that the charger came fully charged when I received it. I have highly recommended RaVPower not only to my family, but also to my colleagues and friends. A "Must Have" charger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for about a week now and it is good. Charges my 2018 6th gen iPad and my iPhone 8 Plus alright. Comes with a carrying pouch, portables charger, and charger for android. It also has a built in flash light. My only Con is it takes for ever to charge the portable (literally the whole day so I leave it to charge over night so when I wake up it’s able to be used).
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna jord

customer_reviews.title: Charges items fast, durable, 1 charge last for days
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I can make a charge in this battery last about 2-4 days depending on what you plug into it. It charges fast and I can charge my I-Phone about 3 times from this unit on one unit charge. Love this!!! Great for busy mom’s and dad’s, college students, or great business investment for traveling sales people! This charger is very durable. I have had it about 3 months and has never failed me from day 1.?
customer_reviews.author: Harlen D Greene

customer_reviews.title: They have some out there with a larger battery, these have came through
customer_reviews.text: I have at least six of these, have given some to my brother who looses power all of the time. I still have One from 2017, still works, I purchase the black ones. Heavy, but good if you need to charge phones tablets etc. The extended warranty is awesome also. Sometimes low to fully charge the power banks up
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: This unit is powerful and useful when needing a quick phone recharge and across multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is powerful and useful when needing a quick phone recharge and across multiple phones. I used it for the first time this weekend and was able to charge both a Samsung Galaxy and iPhone 6 at the same time with no issues and plenty of remaining power to then charge an iPhone 7. Overall, this is a solid external battery with high quality build, design and functionality/ It has a charge-remaining indicator light, comes with a neat carry bag and two USB to micro USB cables. If you're an iPhone owner, you'll need to supply your own apple compatible cable.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great power bank, great company.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd RavPower power bank I have purchased. The first one I've had for over a year and it still charges like the first day I got it. Great product. O recently purchased a 2nd bank because my kiddos kept stealing the first one. After 30 days the 2nd bank stopped charging and taking a charge, I contacted Ling at RavPower. The response was very fast, after a little troubleshooting it was decided my bank had a defect and a new one is on the way. I am grateful for amazing customer service and fast fair responses. Thank you RavPower😁
customer_reviews.author: Mechanical

customer_reviews.title: Great battery so far
customer_reviews.text: When I order USB batteries the key features I am looking for are: - battery capacity - at least 2 USB port to charge 2 devices or even better built in cables with at least a lightning cable (iphone) - flashlight - overall size/dimension and ratio capacity The RAVPower is great with all the features listed... This is the battery I am keeping on my night stand or going to carry in my luggage when traveling. The flashlight is great, and I like the overall LED band which is convenient to light up for a few seconds when pressing the power button once. The battery capacity is on the high end side which is good.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Yoda

customer_reviews.title: Multiple charges available over a week. Easy, reliable and just slighter larger than phone.came with cables to charge android /i
customer_reviews.text: My phone tends to lose battery charge every couple hours. So I needed a backup charger. Until I got this I just did without. No more. This backup charger is great. Charges my phone several times then others used it. I now carry it with me. Provided 12 charges in one day and still was ready to charge. Now these weren't full charges but everyone was happy. Great purchase. I have recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Kietzman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, so happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with the tactile look and feel of the product. Outer shell is a slightly matte graphite finish and is roughly the size of an iphone 6 plus (albeit a bit smaller). It feels solid in the hand. Its power indicator is bright enough to see in daylight conditions and it tells the charge accurately. I plugged it into my iPhone and it began charging no issues. Upon immediate testing, it fully charged to my iPhone battery with at about 50% capacity leftover. Overall, very satisfied with the product; it came with a full charge and a Micro-B USB cord with it so I was able to use it straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: cutrang

customer_reviews.title: Not a champ in the longevity category
customer_reviews.text: I’m coming up on a year with it now, and sadly it no longer will take a charge. It takes all day and night to refill. It was wonderful the first 6 months. Then I noticed it would take longer to recharge. Now it seldom gets past 2 bars after 4-6 hours, so I’ll have to toss it. When it was new I could charge an iPhone running less than 20% all the back to 100 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought five more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery charger for myself over a year ago and then bought five more for Christmas gifts. I get at least eight charges on my iphone 5 before I need to recharge the charger. It's bigger and heavier then some of the newer models but it's dependable and that's what I need. I got it at a good price and it's worked great for me. If you don't want to spend a ton of money and you don't need it to be super light but need dependability, then you won't be sorry. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger P.

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy, but a great charger!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavier than other chargers, but it holds its charge for a long time, I’ve had it in my bag for over a month (unused) and it’s still ready to go and fully charged. It also charges my iPhone XR very quickly. I can charge my phone from dead to full within 25-30 min, and I get about 5 charges per full battery. I definitely recommend this charger.

customer_reviews.title: Great powerbank.

customer_reviews.title: Charges my iPhone 7 pretty fast. Haven't counted how many times yet but ...

customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Get this charger! I just passed three years with it.

I never have to find an outlet no matter where I am. To top it off, it is a perfect size to go in almost every carry on or computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Soundaround

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Travelers

I have also used it to charge an iPad as well as my wireless headphones. Trust me, if you are looking for a battery, there is not a better example for this price.
customer_reviews.author: CBeck09

customer_reviews.title: Works well

Probably not a big deal for most, but since I'm powering a wireless camera, I have to deal with a reboot when I changeover. Seems nice otherwise though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail. So far so good! Comes with a full charge straight out of the box. The flashlight is about what you'd expect for an external battery/portable charger. customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worked at Disney!

customer_reviews.title: Seems to hold a charge forever!

It does not time out during use though.

customer_reviews.title: Died before 1 year mark

I've tried several times over the last year to get it to accept a charge, but it won't hold. The charger lights up blue, but even after a full day on charge, it still won't accept the charge, and the blue line won't get past it's initial start. This is what happened when it started dying, but I thought I was leaving it on the charger long enough. This was not worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This Charger is a God send and a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is the best external charging battery pack on the market. I purchased two and haven't had any problems yet. The charging power is superb. I use my lightning fast charging cord to charge my galaxy 7 and its amazing how fast it reaches full charge.
customer_reviews.author: INGRID MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 4 months
